channel.title: travel on Hugi's Elephant
channel.description: Recent content in travel on Hugi's Elephant

item.title: Going on a trip to Korea tomorrow
item.description: I’m going to Korea tomorrow and I am still not packed… So I don’t have time to post anything longer. Maybe I can share my packing checklist. Strangely enough, this is one of my most used templates! Compiled over time from my past mistakes. Every time I leave something behind and think, “I wish I had brought this on my trip…” I put it in this list. Very useful for me on every trip.
